body.name: PRUVEEO Dash Cam, 4 Channel Camera FHD 1080Px4, Front, Left, Right and Rear, Front and Rear Inside, Built in GPS WiFi, 256 GB Max, Free 128GB Card, D90-4CH
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 38 mins
features: [4 Channel Front and Rear and Inside Dash Cam] The quad FHD 1920*1080P dash cam's 150-degree super wide-angle lens and 3 inches huge LCD screen gives sharper movies and images even when traveling at high speeds, and allow you to re-watch important moments. The first dash cam can simultaneously record the front and sides of the vehicle and the two cabin cameras can freely change the recording angles and rotate left and right allowing you to record in opposite directions as well.

[Built-in GPS and Tracking Speed] The new D90-4CH dash camera's integrated GPS allows it to precisely pinpoint the vehicle's location, speed (KMH/MPH), time, and routes on a map in real-time. Install and use the GPS player. The right side of the GPS player displays the path trajectory that has been taken and coordinates help track the precise positions of an accident, which is important for roadside help and insurance claims.

[Quality Night Vision and Reassuring All-Weather Monitor] The cabin cameras have an F1.8 aperture and 4 infrared lights. In addition to producing incredibly clear recordings, its image performance will be far superior to that of other dash cams at night. The three cameras also have the latest, most sensitive night vision image sensor integrated right into them, so they can capture stunning images even in pitch-black spaces at night that protects you around the clock.

[Loop Recording and Emergency Accident Locks] To assure indefinite loop recording, the oldest unlocked footage will be automatically erased when the memory card reaches its maximum storage capacity. Once the built-in G-sensor senses a collision, the D90-4CH dash cam will automatically lock the currently recording footage as evidence of an event. Loop Recording will not overwrite the locked files.

[Easy Installation with No Battery] With the help of the reference images in our user manual, this D904CH-MINI dash camera is very simple to install and use. The accompanying suction mount is simple to install in a matter of seconds on your windshield. Add an SD card and link to the power source. There is no battery included to prevent mishaps from sun exposure, hot temperatures inside the automobile, or battery damage.
body.description: Pruveeo D90-4CH Quad Camera Dash Cam Front + Left + Right + Rear Equipped with a 2022 state-of-the-art processor every detail of your video looks amazing. The adjustable lens makes it possible for you to capture more details as you like. It can easily cover 4 lanes and ensure there is no dead angle in front of the car. 1080P + 1080P + 1080P + 1080P Adjustable Lens 8 Infrared Lights Built-in GPS Logger Built-in G sensor Built-in Super Capacitor WDR Technology Parking Mode

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: After many analyses, we found that most of the problems of the dash cam are caused by the memory card because the speed and the number of erasing and writing of the memory card cannot meet the requirements. Therefore, the package comes with a free 128GB V30 speed memory card, 1500 times of erasing and writing, this memory card has been tested many times, specifically for the 4 FHD cameras D90-4CH recorder. It is more durable than the high-end memory cards in the market, which can make the D90-4CH recorder more stable, reliable, and work continuously for a long time. Therefore, we recommend using the memory card we give away. *If you want to use the parking monitor function, please search for B0CGXK823B on Amazon and purchase our 3A smart ACC hard wire kit separately. [4 Channel Front and Rear and Inside Dash Cam] The quad FHD 1920*1080P dash cam's 150-degree super wide-angle lens and 3 inches huge LCD screen gives sharper movies and images even when traveling at high speeds, and allow you to re-watch important moments. The first dash cam can simultaneously record the front and sides of the vehicle and the two cabin cameras can freely change the recording angles and rotate left and right allowing you to record in opposite directions as well. [Built-in GPS and Tracking Speed] The new D90-4CH dash camera's integrated GPS allows it to precisely pinpoint the vehicle's location, speed (KMH/MPH), time, and routes on a map in real time. Install and use the GPS player. The right side of the GPS player displays the path trajectory that has been taken and coordinates help track the precise positions of an accident, which is important for roadside help and insurance claims. [Quality Night Vision and Reassuring All-Weather Monitor] The cabin cameras have an F1.8 aperture and 4 infrared lights. In addition to producing incredibly clear recordings, its image performance will be far superior to that of other dash cams at night. The three cameras also have the latest, most sensitive night vision image sensor integrated right into them, so they can capture stunning images even in pitch-black spaces at night that protect you around the clock. [Loop Recording and Emergency Accident Locks] To assure indefinite loop recording, the oldest unlocked footage will be automatically erased when the memory card reaches its maximum storage capacity. Once the built-in G-sensor senses a collision, the D90-4CH dash cam will automatically lock the currently recording footage as evidence of an event. Loop Recording will not overwrite the locked files. [Easy Installation with No Battery] With the help of the reference images in our user manual, this D90-4CH dash camera is very simple to install and use. The accompanying suction mount is simple to install in a matter of seconds on your windshield. Add a SD card and link to the power source. There is no battery included preventing mishaps from sun exposure, hot temperatures inside the automobile, or battery damage.

Warm Tips: Comes with a free 128GB V30 speed memory card. Max Supports 256 GB SD Card. Please DON’T USE any "Generic Class 10" Cards from third-party sellers. They are NOT made for 4 channel recording dash cam. The dash cam works automatically. It starts recording when the engine is turned on and stops when it is turned off. For better night vision, the interior camera uses a special lens that can detect ultraviolet rays in the sunlight, so the video will be purple. You can test it in places without sunlight. Please format the card on the Dash Cam before you use it. You can find the Format option on the menu. No built-in battery for better safety. Please always connect the dash cam to the external power cord while it is in use. This dash cam has the Auto Power Off feature. When there is no external power connection, the dash cam will shut down after 5 seconds. The Package comes with the 3M Adhesive Mount Kit and the Suction Cup Mount. The D90-4CH dash cam can't work with any Mirror Mount Kit. The Package comes with Windshield Static Cling to keep the windshield clean.

Package Contents Pruveeo D90-4CH Dash Cam Rear CameraPower Cord (12ft)128 GB SD CardSuction Cup Mount 3M Adhesive MountsUser ManualCar Wiring ToolWindshield Static Cling Pruveeo D90-4CH Quad Camera Dash Cam Front + Left + Right + Rear Equipped with a 2022 state-of-the-art processor every detail of your video looks amazing. The adjustable lens makes it possible for you to capture more details as you like. It can easily cover 4 lanes and ensure there is no dead angle in front of the car. 1080P + 1080P + 1080P + 1080P Adjustable Lens 8 Infrared Lights Built-in GPS Logger Built-in G sensor Built-in Super Capacitor WDR Technology Parking Mode

Built-in GPS Built-in GPS accurately records your driving location and speed. View your driving route and tracker on google maps via network using the App or with our Car DV Player. Parking Monitor If you want to use the parking monitoring feature, please search for B0CGXK823B and purchase our 3A smart hardwire kit, with a low-voltage protection function. IP69K Waterproof Rear Camera The rear camera can be mounted in the cabin or above the license plate outside. Comes with the backup camera function by connecting the signal cable to the power supply of the reversing lights.

Built-in G-sensor When the G-sensor detects a collision, the current video is locked, ensuring important footage is kept protected. The locked video files cannot be erased during Loop Recording, they remain on the memory card until the card is reformatted. We recommend using the Low setting for this feature. WDR - Wide Dynamic Range Depending on the lighting, the image may look overexposed or underexposed, but don’t worry, Pruveeo has helped you to resolve the problem with our WDR feature. Once you turned on the WDR feature, the dash cam will combine two images into one, producing an authentic robust image regardless of any type of lighting. Support SD Card up to 256GB It is important to us that our customers can enjoy the best recording experience possible. This is why we worked hard to manufacture a dash cam that can support the biggest memory card in the industry. Comes with a free 128GB V30 speed memory card. Max Supports 256 GB SD Card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PRUVEEO Dash Cam, 4 Channel
reviews.reviewText: PRUVEEO Dash Cam, 4 Channel – This product is well made. Pretty easy to set up. I like how the cam covers pretty much all sides. The cameras are very adjustable, really like that feature. Pictures are clear. Easy to use. The camera is not so big that it obstructs my view out my windshield. Easy to setup and I’m in my 70’s. If I can do it, anyone can do it. Instructions are pretty simple, please read the instructions before starting, it only takes a few minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 cams in 1 unit perfect coverage, love it❣️
reviews.reviewText: I love the design,quality,easy setup,camera came with SD card. Price was reasonable. I'm happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did have a problem with my device and contacted customer support. They were very responsive and helpful and they quickly sent me a replacement that is working perfectly.The camera positions are easy to adjust.The picture quality is great and installation was easy, the included tool really helped routing the wires in the roof liner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Easy installation and device management. I used some heavy duty gel tape to mount the cam to my cab. It’s held up well for the past 2 months in freezing & rainy weather. I don’t use the sliding window, so this spot worked well for me. I may move it to the inside when summer gets here and ensure picture quality. The purpose is of course to record accidents, etc…to set this feature up, go to M, video settings, gravity sensing (G-Sensor) this is the level of force required to trigger protected recording. Low sensitivity = great amount of force/impact (accidents, etc), high sensitivity = slightest amount of force/impact (pot holes, door slams, etc) play around with the settings and see what works for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a must have to cover your rear end in time of an accident. Very happy with its performance. The camera angles are amazing and it is very easy to use and get the videos out to a computer. Do not hesitate to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Manual So-So, Product Very Nice
reviews.reviewText: The installation instructions could be much better written as there are two styles mounts available with the package. But the camera so far has been amazing and once you identify the parts, very easy to install. The package gives you above and beyond everything you need for install and use.Haven't installed the rear camera yet, but will update then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best camera for catching all the (bad) action on the road!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome camera!!! This thing records front rear and side views and is easy to operate. Guaranteed to catch all the bad actors out there. Highly recommended if you're tired of all the a-holes on the road like me. Watcha gonna do when I come for you!?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does exactly what you want.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, barely needed the instructions but those were straight forward. Video works, audio works, and I'm sure will come in handy at some point.
One of the camera was noisy, the wide view for cabin cameras is cheap
